front.title: Encryption of Header Extensions in the Secure Real-Time Transport Protocol (SRTP)

abstract.t: The Secure Real-Time Transport Protocol (SRTP) providesauthentication, but not encryption, of the headers of Real-TimeTransport Protocol (RTP) packets. However, RTP header extensions maycarry sensitive information for which participants in multimediasessions want confidentiality. This document provides a mechanism,extending the mechanisms of SRTP, to selectively encrypt RTP headerextensions in SRTP.
